elements.2211.03118_e96b8e8bc26aaaa7b7563722e66bc: Hydrogen, an essential resource in the decarbonized economy, is commonly produced as a by-product of chemical plants
elements.2211.03118_a0594a67776ee95b7d075aefe2588: To promote the use of by-product hydrogen, this paper proposes a supply chain model among chemical plants, hydrogen-storage salt caverns, and end users, considering time-of-use (TOU) hydrogen price, coalition strategies of suppliers, and road transportation of liquefied and compressed hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_f5a2768cf278565c29d13c09f5adf: The transport route planning problem among multiple chemical plants is modeled through a cooperative game, while the hydrogen market among the salt cavern and chemical plants is modeled through a Stackelberg game
elements.2211.03118_2192a41279e7400caccafdf5e8ea2: The equilibrium of the supply chain model gives the transportation and trading strategies of individual stakeholders
elements.2211.03118_c91f7362e5efb95505c60fc63b19e: Simulation results demonstrate that the proposed method can provide useful insights on by-product hydrogen market design and analysis.
elements.2211.03118_0efc5abb7a339b179b34391226cb2: Hydrogen market, large-scale storage, Stackelberg game, cooperative game, supply chain
elements.2211.03118_e65df6e49f0847bb29c62552f7a49: Index of time periods during the day.
elements.2211.03118_3c99834ca352fc006e168a3e343f5: Index of hydrogen processing equipment, including liquefiers and compressors.

elements.2211.03118_fe8ca50a6b493517eff0254330bce: at the end of the time period

elements.2211.03118_0d24f0617bd500e4236f7cf44d659: is shipped directly to the salt cavern

elements.2211.03118_82e7dd6eb39600a1427d8e12fb1c8: Hydrogen quality in the tube trailer (or tanker truck) left at chemical plant
elements.2211.03118_15ab8fdc366ef7b960dde5840cd6b: before filled to capacity in period
elements.2211.03118_65defbb33f9b2622d4ffebde7b417: Hydrogen quantity temporarily stored in low-pressure storage tanks before compression or liquefication in period
elements.2211.03118_2c516c59f3408dbd644cca8972bc7: Integer variables of tube trailers (or tanker trucks) leave chemical plant
elements.2211.03118_cec782c9436ecdb9929bf7eb34e61: the context of emission peak and carbon neutrality, hydrogen is not only regarded as a critical alternative to fossil fuel to achieve carbon neutrality but offers versatility and flexibility that renewables cannot reach
elements.2211.03118_a326a24d3990ace87050c3e8a38d9: As one of the most cost-effective options, hydrogen produced as a by-product from many chemical plants serves as a cheap and large-scale source of hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_8786d0150af662486e60d5cd79512: Moreover, by-product hydrogen is usually sufficiently clean and well suited for a wide range of applications, such as fuel cell (FC)-based cogeneration, FC vehicles, domestic heating, and so on
elements.2211.03118_414457a6173b763124b516fe80152: However, the potential of by-product hydrogen has yet to be realized, which is emitted and thus wasted in most cases
elements.2211.03118_3c02dc44a0cf92cc4c9bd9e59ad70: Therefore, it presents opportunities as a new revenue stream for chemical plants and promisingly delivers on announced pledges of energy conversion nationwide in the mid-term
elements.2211.03118_76ce5490cb311463fd512cc33d2ae: However, the lack of infrastructure development such as large-scale storage, logistical supply chain establishment and unexplored market have slowed down its further development
elements.2211.03118_f03d9036d57f4b25061c320d42f34: Salt cavern storage is one of the most promising technologies to achieve large-scale, fast and secure hydrogen storage
elements.2211.03118_a0b31d1702e62f8ec31161919b85a: ,which offers the most promising option owing to their low investment cost, high sealing potential and low cushion gas requirement
elements.2211.03118_eb27da10b452198d9aab4acc8e06e: Notable projects are the salt cavity storages for hydrogen in Teeside, UK, and Texas, USA
elements.2211.03118_af902193fc37032ae984cef34179a: , demonstrating the operation feasibility on a full industrial scale
elements.2211.03118_a69b03a9d762e6177a2cb50146664: However, the business of acquiring, storing and selling by-product hydrogen has not yet been presented as an option by salt cavern operators, which inspires the work to design by-product hydrogen supply chain considering large-scale storage and chemical plants in this paper.
elements.2211.03118_1abf4ec92dd21a447999805f31d8e: As demand and production capacity for hydrogen grows robustly in recent years, the outlines of hydrogen markets are starting to emerge worldwide
elements.2211.03118_12db5c5846c409879a8881038e244: Initial trade and market price discoveries come first on a regional and local basis
elements.2211.03118_3f19dcbaaf52befae705ed276e044: Infrastructure development, transparent pricing benchmark and logistical supply chain establishment are key growth challenges faced by this new traded commodity just becoming established in energy commodity markets
elements.2211.03118_b3124f1f624915e574e22cf06a119: Presently, the hydrogen market is far from mature but is showing great potential
elements.2211.03118_dad72dfc7e29ad97b97912946ccc8: Many researchers focus on the planning of the hydrogen supply chain, considering various market scales, hydrogen sources and transportation modes
elements.2211.03118_e1ccbe893074da146bd546f3e99a8: Life cycle analysis to estimate the economic and environmental benefits was conducted on global
elements.2211.03118_cb280a0ee1b495abd9644239faf88: For different hydrogen sources, steam methane reforming (SMR)
elements.2211.03118_3107ae159bca772ed3f77e932baa4: are common production technologies in recent researches
elements.2211.03118_f9b4c1af368ba7d3f9a4dd1bde3a0: Considering hydrogen production based on different feedstocks and energy sources, an optimal structure of the hydrogen, biomass and
elements.2211.03118_3cc679268e4af6d65bbbe96c499c6: To make comparisons of different transportation modes, Ref.
elements.2211.03118_111749cf01b461f6cc6a6a55c772e: considered four common options with various criteria and scenarios
elements.2211.03118_2ec5138ebebdbc7c6c9f5987e07bd: introduced a method for comparing different transport possibilities of tube or liquid trailer vs. pipeline delivery
elements.2211.03118_96702ab9cdf972fe3c0ccd7a1b1ee: The results showed that each transportation technology had a maximally cost-efficient niche and there was no single perfect solution for the entire system
elements.2211.03118_3b840f1c1c9fad2d33c43407524f6: Recently, large-scale storage for liquid hydrogen is of great attention
elements.2211.03118_fa8a5114f96ca59d08e3714033285: considered integrated bulk storage of hydrogen and concluded that a centralized storage structure and liquefication in central production plants can reduce the overall cost
elements.2211.03118_ed0c6851d3beb47ea60da2ea4d5a6: Similarly, the status and key gaps for the commercialization of hydrogen liquefication technology with large-scale storage were discussed in
elements.2211.03118_9b91e2454925baff4eb607d3020ef: A combination of the hydrogen supply chain with other energy sources has also attracted the attention of many researchers
elements.2211.03118_dddbdea87fcc64d2e020c7a70b629: established a local energy market for electricity and hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_9d39b13539dbb96699bd299c1d2f9: proposed a methodological design framework for hydrogen and methane supply chains based on Power-to-Gas systems
elements.2211.03118_db095c2f9dc1a2e7b6fe6933d21b2: In particular, by-product hydrogen has seen growing attention these years
elements.2211.03118_bb049bd1af42061b43fb16fba2360: for the first time assessed the economic advantages, the techno-economic feasibility and the central role of reusing by-product hydrogen in the early phase of hydrogen infrastructure in the northern Spain region
elements.2211.03118_8bca8849f43cfaa745c84dd02f89a: A multi-period programming was designed in
elements.2211.03118_31931fc6cd10b64ef8c22391bfca2: to make use of existing infrastructure for by-product hydrogen and natural gas (NG) pipelines, which demonstrated the economic benefits of by-product hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_0e65ac5e47a57b72ab22147bcaf69: Even though, the potential of by-product hydrogen remains to be discovered
elements.2211.03118_4d6bea8def8a6741f935bbe953e92: Meanwhile, most of the literature focuses on maximizing the total benefit of the whole hydrogen supply chain
elements.2211.03118_6d956763a53bc2fc7fd9038e22f1f: aimed to maximize social welfare in Korea by planning both capacity and technology of production, storage as well as transportation in an envisioned nationwide hydrogen supply chain
elements.2211.03118_e65b2e0aa2f63517f8b92337fc539: assessed the effects that hydrogen grades play in the development of a cost-effective hydrogen supply chain
elements.2211.03118_e710f5eee9c485dcb1ff5362e5898: incorporated the concept of biophysical limits of the planet to address the optimal design of the hydrogen supply chain
elements.2211.03118_dcf81041719708a89cba2e8c8cfbb: An optimization method was proposed in
elements.2211.03118_9d9b476d1f5ac1f1cdd0a5bebc71b: for an integrated value chain of carbon dioxide and hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_f75ab89ede6965017681aa68782e9: , where the peer-to-peer transaction, endogenous market-clearing price, and uncertainties in hydrogen production were considered in detail
elements.2211.03118_be81d7d4003ac189a84687afcf840: However, most works failed to consider the strategic behaviors and the profit of individual participants, which differed from the usual practice that suppliers and retailers are private companies and operate with a profit-driven mode
elements.2211.03118_30eff4aa81a5304ac49333fae5328: The research gaps for the existing works are:
elements.2211.03118_c56fb6f57c8b76ab6503d21a9f5dd: The potential of by-product hydrogen is yet to be realized and its corresponding market is waiting for further exploration.
elements.2211.03118_cda5210ec0524aeee48c45a206418: The dynamic process of chemical plants and salt caverns considering hydrogen generation, compression (or liquefaction), and the transaction is waiting to be modeled.
elements.2211.03118_98b9c4167f118735a3f0459187911: The interactions and dynamic strategic behaviors of each stakeholder desire a more dedicated modeling framework that captures profits and rationality of individual participants.
elements.2211.03118_39944d6eb1444deb52af9694e76a6: In this work, we study the by-product hydrogen supply chain considering large-scale storage and multiple chemical plants
elements.2211.03118_278e24dde73291d85090a19f5577f: We establish a business model for salt caverns to acquire and store by-product hydrogen from chemical plants and sell them to end-users
elements.2211.03118_9705cecd00f517e13ae4f68967724: The by-product hydrogen supply chain composed of each stakeholder in the business model is investigated.
elements.2211.03118_d71001dc8d847afabe7e1868a2ee0: The hour-by-hour decision-making process of each stakeholder, i.e., chemical plants and the salt cavern, is investigated and mathematically modeled under the proposed business model, providing a foundation for the TOU hydrogen pricing strategy.
elements.2211.03118_3b48a3b10dde75e295ce568500e21: The by-product hydrogen market is formulated as a game, considering the individual rationality of each stakeholder
elements.2211.03118_975d6ac403248b99dba8268ae3dd5: The planning problem among multiple chemical plants is modeled through a cooperative game
elements.2211.03118_0cfb0126757eaf1174fa3d5a6742f: The hydrogen market among the salt cavern and chemical plants is modeled through a Stackelberg game, in which the salt cavern is the leader and chemical plants are the followers.
elements.2211.03118_fe6fb3cf01f972f27aaab90d0c7cf: A business model of salt caverns and chemical plants
elements.2211.03118_2f946c29913c0ee57724d175543d1: In this section, we develop a business model for salt caverns to acquire by-product hydrogen from chemical plants and sell them to end-users
elements.2211.03118_aed0e3d45471b13cd42ea4df1734f: Generation, large-scale storage, and consumptive way of by-product hydrogen in the business model is introduced first
elements.2211.03118_d592272f8212c545c3316aa69f9ec: Then, the comparison between the by-product hydrogen supply chain and the present hydrogen supply chain is made
elements.2211.03118_c886d383a3eb2e301a9d6605fc24b: Followed by this, the structure of the by-product hydrogen market under the proposed business model is introduced in the following section.
elements.2211.03118_e09807255eefeee28f458a49231e8: Generation, Large-scale Storage and Consumptive Way of By-product Hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_42cfb078824673fd61991c02710cb: By-product hydrogen is a cost-competitive and widely distributed source of hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_d2641efa858caaa208315a12072e1: The process of generation of by-product hydrogen and its consumptive ways are illustrated in Fig.
elements.2211.03118_eb1b298ca8fa88c9b04bd7437e98f: Electrochemical processes, such as the industrial production of steel, caustic soda and chlorine, produce hydrogen as a by-product, burnt or emitted as the current practice
elements.2211.03118_827968b51da964a66738110281aaf: However, they can be made available for applications outside chemical plants as a future consumptive way
elements.2211.03118_91ce27070ac9a869feb8c1da0e7d1: To transport products from the production facilities to storage sites, by-product hydrogen should be compressed or liquified in advance, which collectively are referred to as âhydrogen secondary processingâ
elements.2211.03118_5e3b1de9fff12e3e6255770800e27: Two common transportation modes are compressed gaseous hydrogen via tube trailers (CH2) and liquid hydrogen via tanker trucks (LH2)
elements.2211.03118_d8aef39993d676dc50ec8825762d8: To alleviate the imbalance between supply and demand of hydrogen, underground cavities like salt caverns are potential to offer natural infrastructure to realize cost-effective and reliable hydrogen storage
elements.2211.03118_782a85a74eeb90fc7d163e1be7441: At the last link in the supply chain, by-product hydrogen is sold and distributed to various end-users
elements.2211.03118_6a65f5e1e6a35b9e3c5a03c02a2cc: The proposed generation, storage and consumptive way of hydrogen give rise to a promising by-product hydrogen business model consisting of chemical plants as suppliers, a salt cavern as a retailer and end-users as consumers.
elements.2211.03118_b3e295ae208f8c72869419c4a0097: Characteristics of By-product Hydrogen Supply Chain
elements.2211.03118_2c66bf4315c8d205af5267a6cbc40: Differences between the by-product hydrogen supply chain under the proposed business model and most hydrogen supply chains found in literature can be mainly concluded as twofold: 1) composition of major costs; 2) flexibility to coordinate between planning and scheduling
elements.2211.03118_2d9dc13c93fa1bb03afdc19308474: These differences will lead to a distinct focus and a smaller timescale for the formulation of the by-product hydrogen supply chain, which is analyzed as follows:
elements.2211.03118_7ba4cff8add004f9e63451d95bbe0:

elements.2211.03118_7ae844db05431b4986445ceb716e8: Major costs of hydrogen supply chain and their influence factors are demonstrated in Table
elements.2211.03118_8393115e8197d370b9e2acc5ac79f: Unlike the present hydrogen supply chain, producers in the by-product hydrogen supply chain benefit from very low-cost generation
elements.2211.03118_2ed677bfbd916588d4bf518bf86a8: Thus, the major cost comes from secondary processing and transportation
elements.2211.03118_49dd26ce1004d912f8e18e2331c20: Power is the major cost for secondary processing
elements.2211.03118_76e9803028f275b5c8cfedb122104: If the liquefier or compressor operates at low-price periods, it may potentially reduce operating costs
elements.2211.03118_4bab4d586ebd5c682a6f2414fb5b2: Since electricity price fluctuates by hours, the strategic behaviors of each stakeholder should also be modeled by hour
elements.2211.03118_4325fd34d24280b4634539bf6eb6d: Transport cost is determined by transportation mode, hydrogen volume and the transport distance
elements.2211.03118_21c47a320ab855d0c3a471e5267c8: For two transportation modes considered in this paper, LH2 features large transport capacity (often 10-20 times as CH2), high initial investment cost (several times as CH2) and hourly volatile losses
elements.2211.03118_4272734b926d6ecf2de4337eb275d: On the contrary, CH2 features low transport capacity, low initial investment cost and zero loss
elements.2211.03118_50c7bdc8cb14f9a97d990120b770c: Usually, for long-distance transportation of a large amount of hydrogen, CH2 is less economical since it requires long rides of much more vehicles than LH2
elements.2211.03118_bb5c8118b5f832c3689bb403c3421: However, for mid- or short-distance of a small amount of hydrogen, CH2 is more economical since there is no volatile loss
elements.2211.03118_3e287db6b739ba8fb3def53a29020: Obviously, a reasonable decision of transportation mode would largely reduce the cost of each chemical plant.
elements.2211.03118_ac52275465ebd4b6513003a8f2c5d: Less flexibility to coordinate between planning and scheduling
elements.2211.03118_fc094ea7206cb5aa60857e24b8b4e: For suppliers in the by-product hydrogen supply chain, the generation scale of hydrogen is limited by the production plan of their main products
elements.2211.03118_c9488de70d2e6aa94ba4c5bec3c1b: Moreover, their location is less likely to be optimized for the transportation of by-product hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_264be078461c041a484a997cdccf8: Therefore, there may be a mismatch between each supplier's location and generation scale
elements.2211.03118_022d1a99eeeebaa670df864d1dcbc: Specifically, for distant (to the salt cavern) and medium-yield chemical plants, if CH2 is adopted, long-distance transport of more tube trailers may result in high transportation costs
elements.2211.03118_c9d20d967cc453fd98fe7ddc7f942: Nevertheless, if LH2 is adopted, substantial volatile losses would happen due to hours of filling time
elements.2211.03118_743fba5c709298d33441b9aef5ffa: This situation results in a dilemma since both transportation mode leads to a revenue decline in some way
elements.2211.03118_3f99aa91f45a70e3daf5be37f2e6f: Therefore, we envision a scenario where several chemical plants in proximity to each other form a coalition and select a transit hub between them to lower transportation costs, instead of shipping individually to the salt cavern
elements.2211.03118_d86c5048a1d286ce315661cf3de00: Two examples of envisioned transportation routes are highlighted in color in Fig.
elements.2211.03118_66d1212114c0cbe594656c159dc8a: Moreover, to lower transportation costs, chemical plants destined for the transit hub adopt the CH2 transportation mode, while the transit hub destined for the salt cavern adopt the LH2 transportation mode
elements.2211.03118_9c240ddb9602bbfd517f74c7aa1d7: In this way, the dilemma between high transportation costs of CH2 and large volatile loss of LH2 is mitigated.
elements.2211.03118_f3da964c0e17a276ceca3fc794aa8: To sum up, cost structure differences and the lack of flexibility to coordinate between production scale and location lead to a gap between the by-product hydrogen supply chain and the present ones
elements.2211.03118_79fcc526661d587f799a75b51d64f: Therefore, it is essential to model the by-product hydrogen supply chain according to its characteristics rather than simply applying the model of the traditional hydrogen supply chain.
elements.2211.03118_d89af2b127d90770fe503034aa874: The Structure of By-product Hydrogen Market
elements.2211.03118_be684fd45f93e02fb00a34e557684: The structure of the proposed by-product hydrogen market is provided in this subsection, followed by the basic assumptions.
elements.2211.03118_9fcfe3b56d9585d6287aa0b5d2a42: The by-hydrogen market under the proposed business model has the structure illustrated in Fig.
elements.2211.03118_933fdf329332d122dd2145e80738a: Suppliers, namely chemical plants, process by-product hydrogen by liquefiers or compressors (depends on the decision results of each supplier) and deliver it to the retailers
elements.2211.03118_c9ec8f0bb88e93dae9b3562653a2e: The retailers, namely salt caverns, sell hydrogen to the customers
elements.2211.03118_60c5366f85e415978cfe755ef66f0: To simplify the problem, salt caverns are regarded as an entity owned by a single company
elements.2211.03118_4f39bdb2e3a09664795a95813087f: This paper focuses on the transaction between suppliers and retailers
elements.2211.03118_266399962d5676e033f9414f42c4d: The following assumptions are made without loss of generality:
elements.2211.03118_da76e614e7d5044266607cd60f8e6: The end-users buy all the hydrogen from the retailer at a fixed price
elements.2211.03118_32385abe00c1cca5bb6a5a7d7eed4: This may happen when the injection-production rate of the salt cavern is higher than the market demand in a region
elements.2211.03118_d00565798be1f7a7c93a652420caf: In order to alleviate the supplierâs market power to drive up prices, we assume that the salt cavern and suppliers have reached such an agreement to bring a fixed price into effect.
elements.2211.03118_4bf15b6ac8404121da1d922e986a8: The secondary processing cost and transport cost is undertaken by suppliers.
elements.2211.03118_cdcc1480f447849cfa8b0bb55851d: The production cost is neglected since hydrogen is a by-product of the industrial process of chemical plants.
elements.2211.03118_e3a5002d6be7a62563013ccab0e22: Chemical plants would not adjust their production schedule of their main product for the revenue generated by by-product hydrogen.
elements.2211.03118_53c0da33b85741e8fd54971d4767c: Based on the above assumptions, the retailerâs and suppliersâ problems can be described as follows
elements.2211.03118_7fb6137b1364cd860bfd3de94f4d8: To maximize profits, the salt cavern intends to purchase as much hydrogen as possible from chemical plants at the lowest cost
elements.2211.03118_f0add2f38fed922b29c6a1d5351d8: If the price is too low, chemical plants are less likely to be attracted by this new revenue stream and may waste them as before, which reduces profits of the salt cavern
elements.2211.03118_eaf1261d8540d88e367426fd77257: On the contrary, if the price is too high, the purchasing cost would increase
elements.2211.03118_c7f8979f03160b28d3e1ae8ce5645: Therefore, it is important for the salt cavern to strike a balance between the attraction of chemical plants and the purchasing cost
elements.2211.03118_4d77bddb3dbd69096c62db0390114: To maximize profits, chemical plants upstream would like to sell more hydrogen when the selling price is high on the one hand, and to reduce processing costs and transport costs on the other hand
elements.2211.03118_2277a8b2d8dcc5737fe2b48c400a9: Taking into account the analysis in the last subsection, the challenges of modeling the by-product hydrogen supply chain under the proposed structure are mainly twofold: 1) to explicitly consider possible coalition structures and transport route strategies in the timescale of transport duration, electricity price fluctuation and volatile losses; 2) and to allocate the payoff among the producers in some fairway.
elements.2211.03118_847520818aedf5fd178b31da6d6ce: Strategies and decision-making process of stakeholders
elements.2211.03118_9763aa441f7f8c8b028fcb86ab49b: In this section, the decision-making process of each stakeholder is investigated and mathematically modeled under the proposed business model.
elements.2211.03118_7cdeccd06fd1cb7a29aca3ca143d0: In the price-setting problem of the salt cavern, the retailer decides its buying price
elements.2211.03118_3f2bfb1dc860a01a24ec57ce81481: (offered to the suppliers), while considering the reactions
elements.2211.03118_4fca798b906e5e065e78913be0f3a: The problem can be formulated as
elements.2211.03118_9f89af64808522b056f96b1356d0f: is the retailerâs profit in which the first term is the selling income, and the second term is the purchasing cost
elements.2211.03118_1b5e7eed81948cd225b2d99ab33ea: restricts the price offered to suppliers to be within the interval
elements.2211.03118_1c3a6c79a8f60596586ad5c3799a2: Here we assume that the retailer and suppliers have already reached an agreement to bring this constraint into effect
elements.2211.03118_044655814cf1c7637c3ff1bc6ced0: prescribes maximal transaction quantity in each period by maximal injection rate of the salt cavern.
elements.2211.03118_06393c528f08b95e0d69635065e49: are the optimal solution to the suppliersâ problem.
elements.2211.03118_2ea42041f903f563753d8b0100e2c: For the suppliers, the planning of the type of processing equipment, transportation mode, and the transport route as well as scheduling of transaction quantity, is formulated in this subsection
elements.2211.03118_74903682c6f91450c684df08425ba: To capture the dynamic process of hydrogen transactions between each stakeholder in detail, as well as investigating dynamic strategic behaviors of each stakeholder, the loading process is elaborately taken into consideration
elements.2211.03118_12fcc805668af6d0bdc3c6560b81c: Specifically, hydrogen is produced as a by-product along with main products and has three possible disposal ways:
elements.2211.03118_c881a3fabfde5ea0913317abb53a8: Hydrogen can be loaded to a tube trailer (or a tanker truck) after compression (or liquefaction)
elements.2211.03118_eea636d483cf50b37ee142d495143: , tube trailers (or tanker trucks) filled to maximum capacity should depart from chemical plants
elements.2211.03118_165031bb19d96108dbd224caddb12: Otherwise, they stay until filled up in the following periods
elements.2211.03118_aa13a2e1c76bad7e4dbbb7adf80c5: depends on hydrogen processing quantity sequence
elements.2211.03118_54468b96e3359a77fe2c0acbef195: Hydrogen can also be temporarily stored in low-pressure storage tanks before liquefication or achieving an adequate compression rate
elements.2211.03118_aa052399f381905644a2b65723279: It will further be loaded into tube trailers (or tanker trucks) after being compressed (or liquified) in the following periods.
elements.2211.03118_53ab9430d618fcfcb7c0e56b63f4c: Hydrogen may also be discarded by being emitted or burnt as the current practice, which may happen when buying price offered by the salt cavern is too low or low-pressure storage tanks are filled up.
elements.2211.03118_ff4f72ea5695d3593eb2612fa6309: The above three disposal ways offer multiple options for chemical plants during planning and scheduling
elements.2211.03118_8fb98e988bd3e1dff9226a22f18ca: For example, a chemical plant with a generation volume of 100kg per hour, may purchase processing equipment of 100kg per hour
elements.2211.03118_96bf0f853c843a886896b8ebc6daf: Thus, hydrogen can be processed hour-by-hour
elements.2211.03118_5c3940fb07a0c91a330ffd9e19a04: An alternative is to purchase processing equipment of 1000kg per hour
elements.2211.03118_82df54fa186aed5a6efd1f579a181: In this case, by-product hydrogen can be temporarily stored in low-pressure storage tanks and will be processed every 10 hours
elements.2211.03118_855d3114dc396ef345c0cc090b2e8: The suppliersâ problem is to find optimal solutions for planning and scheduling while considering possible coalitions with each other
elements.2211.03118_37158ff5f594c8341bb4d19b50c2e: In the suppliersâ problem, if the destinations of all suppliers for hydrogen shipment are the salt cavern, decision variables should be the type of processing equipment
elements.2211.03118_4ed6225ccd82215681d713dcf20e0: ; if the scenario of coalitions of suppliers is taken into account, transport route
elements.2211.03118_eda43bbb6a168b146a28eb6299a58: The decision-making problem, including constraints and objectives of supplier
elements.2211.03118_b1b73fe862d3ef679f4cfdf3d0147: denotes that the destination of each chemical plant is unique
elements.2211.03118_3064f39a02aa0caa38fccd1b0452e: defines that any pairs of the chemical plant
elements.2211.03118_8bb17a5ca080881cb611c8dd065bf: wouldnât select each other as the transit destination simultaneously.
elements.2211.03118_c59131eafa3675d418dcb82d3f590: Constraints on hydrogen processing and transport scheduling
elements.2211.03118_6cfb5106d4fe699a496be797eb1c0: indicate that hydrogen transaction amount in each period is an integer multiple of the capacity of a tube trailer since only tube trailers filled to maximum capacity will depart from chemical plants
elements.2211.03118_40b9ee98e41ec442194989ad4e64f: denotes variations of hydrogen quantity stored in low-pressure storage tanks
elements.2211.03118_1c95cc3a98231c8cd415feae66381: With the remaining proportion of hydrogen after being shipped from chemical plant
elements.2211.03118_7608c9b6719c44149c33ed9116751: represents the salt cavern) written as

elements.2211.03118_878d746909e9c1ee5aa4cdfcfc91b: as the upper bound of tube trailers (or tanker trucks) in the round trip during the time period
elements.2211.03118_ab01aba023e6753d8ba040db4044a: prescribes the processing capability of each chemical plant
elements.2211.03118_2e89b427c8363f0c040e03e2b88bc: restricts the upper bound of hydrogen stored locally, and the bound parameter is chosen as

elements.2211.03118_fa337ab6302dbdef6ba22b64335f3: ' indicates that hydrogen as a by-product can be stored temporarily or directly discarded

elements.2211.03118_70ea033bd3f7b3dd1fd59216567eb: Game Formulation for By-product Hydrogen Supply Chain
elements.2211.03118_231d9f7ebcc8616c47c99e12a98a5: In this section, the by-product hydrogen market is formulated as a game, considering the individual rationality of each stakeholder
elements.2211.03118_2deda545bfe428ee91f3d66557066: The decision-making process of each individual can be concluded as follows
elements.2211.03118_4ea59617ab5f928c916f16d5b54ac: The suppliers plan their initial equipment investment, coalition structure and transport routes in the planning stage
elements.2211.03118_d4a64c2fced06e7fbf2a428f8ab56: Then, the hydrogen transaction problem, including the retailer's pricing problem and suppliers' scheduling problem, is optimized in the scheduling stage
elements.2211.03118_b804149b190b3cb0e7a41e4fbe5a4: The overall framework of the game models is illustrated in Fig.
elements.2211.03118_7a2164c69e4250451af5162b0b800: Specifically, the planning problem of multiple chemical plants is formulated as a cooperative game, in which a binding coalition could be formed to reduce transport costs
elements.2211.03118_128c09055cba7b21942336f61291e: The hydrogen transaction problem between the salt cavern and chemical plants is formulated as a Stackelberg game, in which the salt cavern is the leader and chemical plants are the followers.
elements.2211.03118_fa032e56d755fbec684564b30ce7f: Coorperative game in the planning stage
elements.2211.03118_4730f9f2ae2b64685c80a763e644a: , coalitions between chemical plants would potentially lower transportation costs, thus bringing collective payoffs
elements.2211.03118_f1cece8b73f98506cc96b19b88c9a: Moreover, to fairly allocate the payoff
elements.2211.03118_7dea359c1f040cfe2e206f7fe9e70: among the players, the Shapley value is adopted
elements.2211.03118_f91aabcb2e6aafd48346c7d87f2e5: The following assumptions are made without loss of generality when considering possible coalition structures: i) Chemical plants in each coalition select one of them as a transit hub to which other chemical plants in the coalition transport hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_0255da3170aef035cabdcadbff065: Since reducing transport costs is considered as the key factor behind the coalition, we assume that two chemical plants destined for the salt cavern lack the motivation to form a coalition. ii) The influence of hydrogen price variations on the coalition structure is neglected since the salt cavern's buying price is unknown at the planning stage
elements.2211.03118_cf92f0dbe9fa7c961d8a6857c99dc: Moreover, the driving force in forming a coalition is to reduce costs rather than to increase the selling income
elements.2211.03118_b13771bc08def4ba65789e1f2a585: Generally, the planning problem of chemical plants is based on the cooperative game, where players are the chemical plants
elements.2211.03118_d73c74cf48ba490819ad7cf183fe8: , decision variables are the type of processing equipment,
elements.2211.03118_0a3c9b7afc81c023847ebd506ef2b: of chemical plants in the coalition
elements.2211.03118_818559ff3f02d51ec8510b2dfd002: for self-sufficient chemical plants and coalitions respectively
elements.2211.03118_708bc6def96baa503acb1259bd0cf: Note that in the planning stage, the optimal solution
elements.2211.03118_cd9d68906f3cb360fd181e8cda2b0: is to roughly estimate operation cost under different transportation mode and processing equipment type decisions, thus helping the decision of transport route
elements.2211.03118_0de83d895e686c419d0d4cc0f42f1: here neglects the influence of hydrogen price variations
elements.2211.03118_6b166cd56fc4f1a9d8ab76d0ff112: will be obtained by equilibrium analysis in the scheduling stage.
elements.2211.03118_a6c89a4e7f3ccae8fb5920cec2fde: Stackelberg game in the scheduling stage
elements.2211.03118_1c723edc04517dccce60df56a5f10: The problem in the scheduling is the hydrogen transaction problem between the retailer and the suppliers
elements.2211.03118_6ec668b9804da2ec60ce0a8fb07bc: After formulating transport route decisions of suppliers as a cooperative game, the interaction between the salt cavern and multiple chemical plants is formulated as a Stackelberg game, where the salt cavern is the leader, whose strategy is the TOU hydrogen price, and chemical plants are followers, whose strategies are hourly transaction
elements.2211.03118_b9a6eb29a66a1eeb97cca7a3fee56: At this stage, the retailerâs and suppliersâ problem can be formulated as a bilevel optimization
elements.2211.03118_06e6ea06682c6a78b7b0c0bae4843: The retailer determines the hydrogen price sequence
elements.2211.03118_bc5ae0c0246577182ce9999247880: in the upper level, and the suppliers decide their optimal transaction pattern
elements.2211.03118_1345804a2230738ab360d1a7ece09: in the lower level, with respect to the hydrogen price sequence
elements.2211.03118_7ab7c02deb4b3f11bb8aeb99a2cef: would in turn influences hydrogen price sequence
elements.2211.03118_53d2efa9d0c52604e0b2d62e2253b: determined by the retailer in the upper level
elements.2211.03118_44be4eafa940b1b1ec4ec398e13db: Assume that the information of each chemical plant, such as transit transport routes, processing equipment type and by-product hydrogen generation quantities, are accessible to the salt cavern
elements.2211.03118_222161fb5c09aceb62d359d02873a: can be predicted by the salt cavern under any given hydrogen price sequence
elements.2211.03118_fda5449699b2c1fc256f6202a6e3f: can be regarded as constraints of the retailerâs pricing problem
elements.2211.03118_78cc72d5f02eae12bfb6f91d27091: According to the analysis above, the interactions between the salt cavern and the chemical plants constitute a Stackelberg competition
elements.2211.03118_95c3ec3e2886936838779d4be1d82: In this competition, the salt cavern is the leader, whose strategy is the TOU hydrogen price sequence
elements.2211.03118_b8a1541c4f744796842bd68b2dda6: Chemical plants are the followers, whose strategy is the hourly hydrogen transaction quantity
elements.2211.03118_adec6a19682b727b3e27e972ce4cd: The leaderâs pricing problem maximizes its profit, subject to the bounds of hydrogen price (Eq.
elements.2211.03118_4f193ccc65dff5dd763c10d38074b: The followersâ scheduling problem maximizes individual profits or coalition profits, subject to constraints given in
elements.2211.03118_235085abc465de73239d3a4545169: In this section, we introduce the solution of the game formulation of the by-product hydrogen supply chain
elements.2211.03118_6a255551e52ad82634d332b363011: Tractable reformulations of the suppliersâ problem are made to efficiently calculate the equilibrium in the lower level for both the planning and scheduling problems
elements.2211.03118_89809758f5db32ea7f3ac5eaa60de: Specifically, for the suppliersâ problem in both stages, the objective of each individual player (or coalition) is irrelevant to the strategies of other individual players (or coalitions), while the strategy set is influenced by the strategies of other individual players (or coalitions)
elements.2211.03118_2375ac218273369c52efc27f127a2: According to the potential game theory, the suppliers' problem can be regarded as a potential game
elements.2211.03118_b7284a8b826aa9798f2f9c157c185: The sum of the objectives of each individual player (or coalition) is the potential function
elements.2211.03118_60642bd5116644aafeaf20ae5bd49: Besides, the pure-strategy equilibrium exists in the transport route planning problem of the suppliers since there exists at least one pure-strategy equilibrium in an infinite potential game
elements.2211.03118_c642b8e27bb3a907dfe848531f33b: Thus, the suppliersâ problem is formulated as a potential game that can be solved as an optimization problem
elements.2211.03118_868c0adac3b4925aaa5591f2697e8: After the reformulation of the suppliers' problem, the planning stage problem is reformulated to a mixed integer nonlinear program (MINLP) with
elements.2211.03118_3f2812e281f9d083bad0af2024757: Commercial solvers such as Baron can be used to solve the problem
elements.2211.03118_1914883c31d4ab5ec41f74210da9c: will be adopted at the scheduling stage.
elements.2211.03118_f67ff83001ef9c76e27a576c32a94: To solve the bi-level problem at the scheduling stage, Genetic Algorithm (GA) is adopted
elements.2211.03118_5d8d22fe2636941b6aae631084939: First, for the salt cavern in the upper level, pieces of hydrogen price sequences are generated and regarded as individuals
elements.2211.03118_bdcd89961c0d58ef32fee25face90: Second, to acquire the fitness of each individual, the suppliersâ scheduling problems in the lower level are solved
elements.2211.03118_deaceb6ac09bccdf4cc9aab77d672: are known at the scheduling stage, the suppliersâ problem becomes a mixed-integer linear program (MILP), which can be solved efficiently by off-the-shelf commercial solvers
elements.2211.03118_89c245d56c7931e2ec2eab0e41050: Thus, daily profits of the salt cavern, considering the best response of the suppliers, can thus be calculated and regarded as finesses for given price sequences.
elements.2211.03118_b8bea83cf0a43ea82570e40fc91f2: To validate the effectiveness of the proposed model and algorithm, numeric experiments on a by-product hydrogen supply chain composed of three chemical plants and a salt cavern are carried out
elements.2211.03118_ef10ceabf79538c829cd7f21a32e0: All of the following tests are conducted on PCs with Intel Xeon W-2255 processor, 3.70 GHz primary frequency, and 128GB memory
elements.2211.03118_70e58a6c9aee4fe5d19ae406a1926: CPLEX 2.16 is used to solve related MILP problems.

elements.2211.03118_25992a697e20993f6c2ca1cbc5511: Equilibrium of Hydrogen Pricing and Scheduling
elements.2211.03118_c073e4fcadccaae1042f7867cd67c: In this case, the fixed price at which consumers purchase is set as 15

elements.2211.03118_3acc41df50f61197d69741bea53ba: It can be observed from Fig.
elements.2211.03118_6dc99bf38e9d75a3c5c9d73ff733b: that the variation trend of the hydrogen transaction quantity goes with the buying price
elements.2211.03118_fef48e8db362c2330b33cd932cf74: The higher the buying price, the higher the transaction quantity
elements.2211.03118_a51192866c4f08a6d5cdac8148cf0: This can be attributed to the storage capacity of chemical plants, which can temporarily store by-product hydrogen in low-pressure storage tanks or tube trailers (or tanker trucks) before filled to maximal capacity
elements.2211.03118_fba07b780a87931c8e10798f89c04: Therefore, the chemical plants can choose to sell hydrogen at a higher price
elements.2211.03118_b1a7bf94657e7805beb49519bbda3: Moreover, due to the influence of the TOU electricity price, the operating cost of the processing equipment fluctuates
elements.2211.03118_97d8d3d7c1004757aa0abf7b46219: The TOU electricity price and the equilibrium of the total processing quantity are plotted in Fig.
elements.2211.03118_e9b0170d165dd64f7c94df92845af: that the variation trend of the hydrogen processing quantity and the TOU electricity price go oppositely
elements.2211.03118_6ab6281cc4da8a142a70acd1579c1: This is because chemical plants tend to process hydrogen when the electricity price is low, thus reducing the processing cost of hydrogen
elements.2211.03118_9d06336b151aec773f35c32fd8bcc: According to the above results, it can be noted that the equilibrium of salt cave pricing encourages chemical plants to process and trade hydrogen when the electricity price is lower
elements.2211.03118_d7723c0e802f6174d13e589dda778: As a result, the salt cavern can purchase hydrogen with lower processing cost, thus reducing the purchase cost of hydrogen per unit
elements.2211.03118_452f074e4a9c59330d0b838675afa: For chemical plants, the hydrogen price is higher during 1-2 periods after periods with lower electricity prices than in other periods, thus reducing the hydrogen processing cost
elements.2211.03118_eb3a5c848ea5bafecc41463466f7b: The result of profits and total transaction quantities are plotted in Fig.
elements.2211.03118_ec66aea52f48a895a462494844adb: The optimal price offered by the salt cavern is about 9
elements.2211.03118_f14adce67bcf821faf67b2b102b16: However, the profit of the salt cavern reaches to
elements.2211.03118_8b4859af5a9ccf10a98eabb23b9b3: 343947.16 at the optimal TOU hydrogen price
elements.2211.03118_5bcc0f340054293b666c6a243bf20: Hence, a TOU hydrogen price strategy for the salt cavern increases its profit by 19.5
elements.2211.03118_3feed678a095e1a157761dcd096c6: Generally, the equilibrium of the Stackelberg game between the salt cavern and the chemical plants benefits all the players
elements.2211.03118_26df84011b33f19076944e20995a5: It also indicates the positive response of the salt cavern and chemical plants to TOU electricity price, and reflects the role of chemical plants in peak shaving and valley filling, which benefits the safe and stable operation of power grid.
elements.2211.03118_5e26d7d28c72edcbd8f8700fe4cfb: Impact of per period transportation operation cost
elements.2211.03118_8017dd7c0d2f2c60f094486700708: The reduction in operation cost of a tube trailer (or a tanker truck) per period
elements.2211.03118_dd19fa45fb3754b1094715d74e6f2: reduces the transport cost, thus bringing down the collective payoff brought by coalitions of chemical plants
elements.2211.03118_85bef38dd097f347780310d026e88: Based on the first assumption in section
elements.2211.03118_fb1db10777485a37ce56f5e4d3630: , each coalition must take one of them as a transit hub, and two chemical plants destined for the salt cavern lack the motivation to form a coalition
elements.2211.03118_bc84ed48b1612151be67609272970: Consequently, the collective payoff declines as the transport cost reduces, until collective rationality no longer holds when the benefits of the coalition are less than the sum of benefits each individual could get on their own
elements.2211.03118_47bb577117ab965692e38bf5359a1: 382, the sum of benefits of chemical plant 1 and 2 under the equilibrium of the 1st and 2nd coalition structure, denoted by
elements.2211.03118_ad8d00cfb6f4424524365d348d86f: , the coalition benefit is more sensitive to
elements.2211.03118_0ae7b23991efc7e5221016136af21: no longer bring additional benefits to individuals, resulting in a breakdown of the coalition.
elements.2211.03118_bebafbe333aa535aaba1357aabc35: Impact of maximal injection rate of the salt cavern
elements.2211.03118_0cd89d2f58200b1ca5249436ba511: of the salt cavern directly limits the total transaction quantity per period between the salt cavern and the chemical plants
elements.2211.03118_951bb28d0ffc77485d2574404d862: to the equilibrium of the second-stage problem.

elements.2211.03118_2070463c4635a947d06b28408f790: has different impacts on the participants: the daily income of chemical plants does not necessarily increase with the increase of
elements.2211.03118_c6b56e2345a2ec58c7c2f2c8ffc68: , whereas the daily income of the salt cavern increases with the increase of
elements.2211.03118_c0d5462a9e2538d745ef34e1e1b4a: Therefore, the salt cavern will be motivated to determine an appropriate
elements.2211.03118_0dfb93839c4e6eed0bfc889bf6ed9: according to the generation scale of by-product hydrogen of the chemical plants so as to increase individual benefits.
elements.2211.03118_ecb49b77006fd54baac0afd1c1fe7: This paper proposes an equilibrium model of a by-product hydrogen market with the salt cavern as the retailer and chemical plants as the suppliers
elements.2211.03118_d6d587d4e51a85f90f31ef75b9eb9: A business model for large-scale storage to acquire by-product hydrogen from chemical plants and sell them to end-users is established for the first time
elements.2211.03118_5380ff32c01996306cf01beae586f: The decision-making process of each stakeholder, i.e., chemical plants and the salt cavern, is investigated and mathematically modeled considering different transportation modes, locations of chemical plants and TOU electricity price
elements.2211.03118_3030170cc4e1aeb1ae86d7a06c91d: To consider the individual rationality of each stakeholder, the by-product hydrogen market is formulated as games
elements.2211.03118_6fb980c18829a0441fd4f9264c799: The transport route planning problem between multiple chemical plants is formulated as a cooperative game
elements.2211.03118_ffc108e3e54f86920342525818831: The hydrogen transaction problem between the salt cavern and chemical plants is formulated as a Stackelberg game
elements.2211.03118_3e90829b4bd9861f05b33ef171d50: Numeric experiments on a by-product hydrogen supply chain composed of three chemical plants and a salt cavern are carried out
elements.2211.03118_f37e6313c0c145774a7425f4fc8ba: The results show that a coalition between chemical plants potentially increases their profits
elements.2211.03118_08c987166de70cc43a3e4498d7389: Moreover, the adoption of TOU hydrogen price in a Stackelberg formulation also increases the profit of the salt cavern
elements.2211.03118_4197597ea28dc336ae4b700202ada: The proposed business model and the optimization of the by-product hydrogen supply chain management not only presents a new revenue stream for both chemical plants and salt caverns but increases resource efficiency and accelerates energy conversion.
